casebody.data:
MURRAY TRANSPORTATION COMPANY, as Bailee of THE Barge Mary K. MURRAY, Appellee, v. THE Steam Tugs POCAHONTAS and GEORGE W. PRATT, CORNELL STEAMBOAT COMPANY, Appellant. No. 28. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 6, 1933. Karlin, Campbell, Hiekox, Keating & Mc-Grann, of New York City (Robert S. Erskine, and Henry P. Elliott, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Foley & Martin, of New York City (James A. Martin, pf New York City, of counsel),, for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
